page.title: 17THE SURVEYORS
page.content:
The group of children who surveyed this area are,in contrast to the rural character of the block,town children.They enjoyed immensely every aspect of this project and learned many new things about an area which lies just across the motorway from their school.
The names of the children and staff who took part are:-
Mary Mc Gaw Miss M.Crawford Lindsay Reid Mr J.Holmes Elizabeth Colqhoun Mrs R.Edgar Graham Houston Mr J.Lynch Alan Jordan Mr A.Johnstone Stuart Buchanan Mr E.Morrison Andrew Harkins Andrew Foggarty John Irvine David Newton
